jokes: Why did the invisible man turn down the job offer? Because he just couldn't see himself doing it.
Have you heard of that new band '1023 Megabytes'? They're pretty good, but they don't have a gig just yet.
When I told my son where milk comes from, he asked, “Mama, how  do the cows sit on those little bottles?”
What is Easter Bunny’s favorite kind of music? Hip-hop, of course!
